Environmental.label: Carbon Emissions Check
Environmental.description: Validates that reported direct carbon emissions remain within the defined organizational threshold.

Environmental.label: Renewable Energy Ratio
Environmental.description: Ensures that a minimum share of total energy use comes from renewable sources.

Environmental.label: Water Usage Efficiency
Environmental.description: Confirms that water is used efficiently, ensuring processes consume no more than set thresholds.

Environmental.label: Waste Recycling Rate
Environmental.description: Checks that a minimum portion of waste generated is being recycled or recovered.

Environmental.label: Biodiversity Protection
Environmental.description: Ensures that biodiversity protection practices are reported and in place.

Environmental.label: GHG Scope 3 Reporting
Environmental.description: Confirms whether indirect Scope 3 emissions are disclosed in accordance with recognized standards.

Environmental.label: Hazardous Waste Disclosure
Environmental.description: Ensures hazardous waste management is disclosed transparently as 'disclosed' or 'not_disclosed'.

Environmental.label: Energy Efficiency Index
Environmental.description: Verifies overall energy efficiency performance meets organizational targets.

Environmental.label: Environmental Fines Check
Environmental.description: Validates that no environmental fines have been incurred during the reporting period.

Environmental.label: Climate Risk Assessment
Environmental.description: Ensures the organization performs a climate risk assessment in line with global frameworks.

Environmental.label: Scope 1 Coverage
Environmental.description: Ensures that Scope 1 (direct) emissions are comprehensively reported and included in the inventory.

Environmental.label: Scope 2 Coverage
Environmental.description: Ensures Scope 2 (indirect energy) emissions are disclosed in compliance with GHG Protocol.

Environmental.label: Scope 3 Coverage
Environmental.description: Ensures Scope 3 (value chain) emissions are disclosed when material and relevant.

Environmental.label: Emission Factors Documented
Environmental.description: Ensures that emission factors used for calculations are disclosed and documented.

Environmental.label: Units Consistency
Environmental.description: Checks that units of measurement are consistent across all reported emissions.

Environmental.label: Reporting Period Consistency
Environmental.description: Ensures emissions reporting period matches the organization’s financial or operational cycle.

Environmental.label: Total Energy Consumption
Environmental.description: Total energy consumed (MWh).

Environmental.label: Renewable Energy %
Environmental.description: % energy from renewables.

Environmental.label: Total Water Withdrawal
Environmental.description: Total water withdrawn (m³).

Environmental.label: Water Recycled %
Environmental.description: % water recycled.

Environmental.label: Total Waste Generated
Environmental.description: Total waste generated (tons).

Environmental.label: Waste Recycled %
Environmental.description: % waste recycled.

Environmental.label: GHG Intensity
Environmental.description: GHG emissions per unit of revenue/output.

Social.label: Employee Diversity Ratio
Social.description: Ensures at least 30% diversity across the workforce (gender, ethnicity, or other protected classes).

Social.label: Pay Equity Gap
Social.description: Validates that the gender pay gap does not exceed 10% across equivalent roles.

Social.label: Health & Safety Incidents
Social.description: Ensures that workplace incidents remain within safety thresholds.

Social.label: Employee Training Hours
Social.description: Validates employees receive a minimum of 20 hours of professional development annually.

Social.label: Turnover Rate Check
Social.description: Ensures voluntary employee turnover does not exceed 15% annually.

Social.label: Whistleblower Policy
Social.description: Confirms presence of a whistleblower protection mechanism.
standards: GRI 102-17 Mechanisms for advice and concerns

Social.label: Community Investment
Social.description: Ensures a minimum level of financial investment in community programs.

Social.label: Data Privacy Incidents
Social.description: Validates that no data privacy breaches have occurred in the reporting period.

Social.label: Human Rights Policy
Social.description: Confirms presence of a formal human rights policy aligned with UN Guiding Principles.

Social.label: % Women Managers
Social.description: Percentage of women in managerial roles.

Social.label: CSR Spend %
Social.description: CSR spend as % of prescribed spend.

Social.label: CSR Beneficiaries
Social.description: Number of people benefitted by CSR projects.

Governance.label: Board Independence Ratio
Governance.description: Ensures that at least 50% of board members are independent.

Governance.label: Exec Compensation Linked to ESG
Governance.description: Confirms that executive pay structures are linked to ESG performance metrics.

Governance.label: Anti-Corruption Policy
Governance.description: Ensures that a zero-tolerance anti-corruption policy exists.

Governance.label: Shareholder Rights Protection
Governance.description: Confirms measures to protect shareholder voting and information rights.
standards: OECD Principles of Corporate Governance Sec.III

Governance.label: Audit Committee Independence
Governance.description: Ensures audit committees have majority independent directors.

Governance.label: Tax Transparency
Governance.description: Validates disclosure of country-by-country tax payments.

Governance.label: Political Contributions Disclosure
Governance.description: Ensures that political contributions are disclosed transparently.

Governance.label: Cybersecurity Governance
Governance.description: Confirms that governance structures exist for cybersecurity oversight.

Governance.label: Risk Management Framework
Governance.description: Validates existence of an enterprise risk management framework.

Governance.label: Stakeholder Engagement
Governance.description: Ensures structured engagement with stakeholders on ESG issues.

Governance.label: % Women Directors
Governance.description: Percentage of women directors on the board.

Governance.label: ESG Committee
Governance.description: Does company have an ESG/sustainability committee?

Governance.label: % ESG-screened Suppliers
Governance.description: Percentage of suppliers screened for ESG criteria.
